https://t.co/PACKF5g2KF

🧵4/5  Our advice will support @EU_Commission implement the #EUFarm2Fork Strategy, to submit, by end 2022, a proposal for harmonised mandatory #frontofpack nutrition labelling and for setting nutrient profiles to restrict promotion of certain foods.
🧵3/5 We were not asked to develop a #NutrientProfiling model or advise on current profiling models already in use for different purposes.

🧵2/5 Our advice will cover: #nutrients of public health importance for Europeans; important food groups in European diets (populations & subgroups); criteria to guide choice of nutrients & non-nutrients in food for #NutrientProfiling.

🧵1/5 Our nutrition scientists have been asked by @Food_EU for scientific advice to inform harmonised #frontofpack #labelling and restrict #healthclaims that promote foods eg high in salt sugars fat. https://t.co/E4GyFkewJp
